report.title: Get my squares and plots
report.description: Get a list of Core Squares and Additional Squares that have been assigned to the user and list them with their associated plots. Only plots without samples are editable. Include only_return_private_plots to only return private plots associated with the user (no parent squares or public plots). Include only_show_my_useable_plots_squares to only return plots and squares the user is allowed save data against, the current rule is: any squares they are assigned to, any plot the user created, or any plot they are assigned to which they didn't create (as long as they are the only person assigned to the plot's square).
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples locationSamples on locationSamples.location_id = l.id LEFT JOIN termlists_terms ttPlotType on ttPlotType.id = l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN terms termPlotType on termPlotType.id = ttPlotType.term_id JOIN locations square on (square.id=l.id OR square.id=l.parent_id) AND square.location_type_id=#core_square_location_type_id# OR square.location_type_id=#additional_square_location_type_id# LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPlotName on lavPlotName.location_attribute_id=#plot_number_attr_id# AND lavPlotName.location_id=l.id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPriv on lavPriv.location_id=l.id AND lavPriv.location_attribute_id = #private_plot_attr_id# AND lavPriv.deleted=false JOIN users u on u.id=#current_user_id# or u.id=#user_id# JOIN person_attribute_values pavOthers on pavOthers.int_value=square.id AND pavOthers.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pavOthers.deleted=false JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=square.id AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE (l.id = square.id OR l.parent_id = square.id) AND #website_filter# AND l.deleted=false GROUP BY square.id,l.parent_id,l.id,lavplotname.text_value,termplottype.term,pav.updated_by_id,u.id,lavPriv.int_value,ttplottype.id HAVING (l.parent_id IS NULL OR (#only_show_my_useable_plots_squares#=0 OR (#only_show_my_useable_plots_squares#=1 AND ((l.created_by_id=#current_user_id# or l.created_by_id=#user_id#) OR count(distinct pavOthers.id) < 2))))

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.display: Id of the plot number attribute

param.name: current_user_id
param.display: Id of the currently logged in user

param.name: user_id
param.display: Also provides a user_id to pass to the report. This is for flexibility as the application can pass either current_user_id (main website) or user_id (app). The app was developed later and needed to use user_id, so ideally the main website should be changed to use that parameter

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: only_return_private_plots
param.join: JOIN location_attribute_values lavPrivOnly on lavPrivOnly.location_id=l.id AND lavPrivOnly.location_attribute_id = #private_plot_attr_id# AND lavPrivOnly.int_value=1 AND lavPrivOnly.deleted=false

param.name: only_show_my_useable_plots_squares
param.description: Only return plots the user created, currently used in the location select on the Extra Species page.

param.name: linear_location_type_id
param.description: Location type id for linear plot.

param.name: 5_location_type_id
param.description: Location type id for 5 x 5 plots.

param.name: 10_location_type_id
param.description: Location type id for 10 x 10 plots.

column.name: show_square_add_plot_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null then true else false end

column.name: show_square_edit_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null AND (l.created_by_id=#current_user_id# or l.created_by_id=#user_id#) AND pav.updated_by_id!=u.id then true else false end

column.name: show_simple_square_edit_control
column.description: Show cut-down version of edit square page?
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null AND pav.updated_by_id!=u.id then true else false end

column.name: show_plot_view_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is not null AND pav.updated_by_id!=u.id then true else false end

column.name: show_plot_edit_control
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is not null AND ((l.created_by_id=#current_user_id# or l.created_by_id=#user_id#) OR count(distinct pavOthers.id) < 2) AND count(locationSamples.id) = 0 AND pav.updated_by_id!=u.id then true else false end

column.name: name
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null then '' || square.centroid_sref || '' when l.parent_id is not null AND lavPlotName.text_value IS null then '' || 'Plot at ' || l.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' else '' || 'Plot ' || lavPlotName.text_value || ' at ' || l.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end

column.name: location_type
column.sql: case when l.parent_id is null then 'square' when ttPlotType.id = #linear_location_type_id# then 'linear' when ttPlotType.id = #5_location_type_id# then '5' when ttPlotType.id = #10_location_type_id# then '10' else '' end

column.name: my_plot
column.sql: case when l.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND (l.created_by_id=#current_user_id# or l.created_by_id=#user_id#) then 'YES' when l.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND (l.created_by_id!=#current_user_id# and l.created_by_id!=#user_id#) then 'NO' else '' end

column.name: private_plot
column.sql: case when lavPriv.int_value=1 then true else false end
